## Color4.scale() method

Creates a new Color4 with the current Color4 values multiplied by scale

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scale(scale: number): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scaling factor to apply |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

a new Color4 object
